title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: Real AnalysisTopological spaces, weak topology, subspace topology, product and quotient spaces, continuous maps and homeomorphism, Hausdorff spaces, compact and locally compact spaces, separation axioms, connectedness, paths, equivalence classes of paths, path connected spaces.

title: How to Crack the Paper
text: You can't unless you are a gwad.
